title: TIE Dart
wikitext:
[[File:TIE-Dart.jpg|thumb|500px]] '''TIE Dart'''
'''Craft''': Sienar Fleet Systems TIE/Dart
'''Affiliation''': Empire Era: Rise of the Empire
'''Source''': Wizards of the Coast ( The Starship Challenge ) a web entchantmet to convert from D6 int D20 Data
'''Type''': Space superiority fighter
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 4,9 meters
'''Skill''': Starfighter piloting: TIE Dart
'''Crew''': 1
'''Crew Skill''': Starfighter piloting 4D+1, starship gunnery 4D
'''Cargo Capacity''': 65 kilograms
'''Consumables''': 1 day
'''Cost''': 60,000 (new), 25,000 (used)
'''Maneuverability''': 2D
'''Space''': 8
'''Atmosphere''': 365; 1,050 kmh
'''Hull''': 2D
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 20/0D *Scan: 40/1D *Search: 60/2D *Focus: 3/3D '''Weapons''': *1 Laser Cannon : Fire Arc: Front
Skill: Starship gunnery
Fire Control: 1D
Space Range: 1-3/12/25
Atmosphere Range: 100-300/1.2/2.5 km
Damage: 4D =====Capsule===== : Solar Panels, similar as in the Interceptor model.
Name come from its wedge shaped pilot module.
